output_list.reason: The 'mintlvlToken' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the total supply, allowing the owner to mint arbitrary amounts of tokens.
The 'burnlvlToken' function does not have a check to prevent underflow of the total supply, allowing any user to burn arbitrary amounts of tokens.
The 'lend' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the user's balance, allowing the owner to lend arbitrary amounts of tokens.
The 'rebatelvlEconomy' function allows the owner to rebate arbitrary amounts of tokens, potentially devaluing the token.
The 'plutocracylvlAchieved' function is only protected by a single owner check, allowing any user to declare a plutocracy.
